LanguageData.AutoTurret.label: Auto-Turret
LanguageData.AutoTurret.description: An airborne automatic turret for fixed-point defense, it can be deployed repeatedly after installing the SRTS engine. This turret itself is fragile and needs to be used flexibly.
LanguageData.AutoTurret_Blueprint.label: Auto-Turret (blueprint)
LanguageData.AutoTurret_Blueprint_Install.label: Auto-Turret (blueprint)
LanguageData.AutoTurret_Frame.label: Auto-Turret (building)
LanguageData.AutoTurret_Frame.description: An airborne automatic turret for fixed-point defense, it can be deployed repeatedly after installing the SRTS engine. This turret itself is fragile and needs to be used flexibly.
